text: Danyal (Arabic/Persian: دانيال, Danyal) is a masculine Muslim given name which means known Intellectual and careful to justice is also a variant spelling of Daniel. It is also the Islamic name given to the Prophet Danyal. Danyal can also refer to: * Danial, Ardabil, a village in Iran * Danial, Mazandaran, a village in Iran * Danyal, Razavi Khorasan, a village in Iran * Mausoleum of Danyal, a mosque, tomb and archaeological site in Tarsus, Turkey * Kristen Danyal, a contestant in the Miss Michigan USA competition
title: Danyal
